Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service District No. 1-A -- 10.47 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Hospital Service District No. 1-A of the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "District"), to continue to levy and collect a special tax of ten and forty-seven hundredths (10.47) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District, said mills to represent a 2.57 mills increase over the 7.900 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2020 pursuant to an election held on May 1, 2010 (an estimated $822,697.68 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 to and including the year 2030, for the purposes of constructing, maintaining, improving and operating the hospital facilities of the District, including the purchase of equipment therefore?
